agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Transportation SUBCOMMITTEE: High Speed Rail TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 16, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. John Raney *Public testimony may be limited to two (2) minutes.* If submitting written documentation, please provide 15 copies (with your name on each) to the committee clerk before or during the hearing. If you intend to testify, please register using the electronic witness affirmation form, which will be available at any registration kiosk located throughout the Capitol Extension. Witness registration will open approximately two (2) hours prior to the start of the hearing and must be completed prior to testifying. HB 709 Wray | et al. Relating to the use of private activity bonds to finance high-speed rail service. HB 1055 Wray Relating to the elevation of high-speed rail tracks in certain counties. HB 1234 Bell, Cecil Relating to the filing of a bond by a private high-speed rail operator with the Texas Department of Transportation. HB 1242 Ashby | et al. Relating to authorization to enter onto property to survey for a proposed high-speed rail facility. HB 1368 Harris | et al. Relating to option contracts to acquire real property for high-speed rail projects. HB 1369 Harris | et al. Relating to the purchase of necessary real property for the construction of a high-speed rail project. HB 1986 Leman Relating to the compatibility of a high-speed rail facility with multiple types of train technology. HB 1988 Leman Relating to the elevation of high-speed rail tracks. HB 1989 Leman Relating to requiring commissioners court approval of a proposed county road alteration for high-speed rail construction. HB 2605 Toth Relating to restrictions on certain state agency actions relating to high-speed rail projects. HB 2716 Leman Relating to authorization for a private entity to enter onto property to survey for a proposed high-speed rail project. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 1235 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
